title: Connect to a DROb
description: Discover and explore interactive digital layers embedded in physical objects. Unlock exclusive content, social interactions, and real-time experiences. Welcome to the Drop Reality.
text: To connect to this DROb, you need to have the STIK APP installed.

title: Scan a DROb
description: Discover and explore interactive digital layers embedded in physical objects. Unlock exclusive content, social interactions, and real-time experiences. Welcome to the Drop Reality.
text: To scan a DROb, you need to have the STIK APP installed.

title: View a user
description: Explore Drop Reality profiles, discover trending creators, and connect with the people shaping the future of social interaction beyond traditional platforms. Welcome to the Drop Reality.
text: To view this user, you need to have the STIK APP installed.

title: Publish content on a DROb
description: Post videos, photos, and stories directly onto a DROb. Turn everyday objects into shareable, viral experiences that bring communities together. Welcome to the Drop Reality.
text: To connect to this DROb and post on it, you need to have the STIK APP installed.

title: View content from a DROb

title: Create a DROb
description: Transform any physical object into a digital-first social hub. Build your own interactive space, engage communities, and shape the future of Drop Reality.
text: To create a DROb, you need to have the STIK APP installed.

title: View a content
description: Access real-time, user-generated content linked to physical objects on Drop Reality.

title: [DR] mini-APPS

title: Enter the Drop Reality, where everything is Social
